metadata.title: CVE-2016-8637 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A local information disclosure issue was found in dracut before 045 whengenerating initramfs images with world-readable permissions when 'earlycpio' is used, such as when including microcode updates. Local attacker canuse this to obtain sensitive information from these files, such asencryption keys or credentials.

criterions.comment: dracut: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
